description:
Tests for a parameter's existence, tests its data type, and provides a default value if one
  is not assigned.
name: param

min.description: define the smallest size of a numeric value, used for type range

max.description: define the biggest size of a numeric value, used for type range

default.description: Default value to set the parameter to if it does not exist.

pattern.description: define a regular expression pattern, to check value against

name.description:
The name of the parameter to test, such as Client.Email or Cookie.BackgroundColor. If
		you omit the DEFAULT attribute, an error occurs if the specified parameter does not exist

type.description: The type of parameter that is required. The default is 'any'.
